parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Preposition
str2: From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

parse: Noun - Genitive Feminine Singular
str2: From archomai; a commencement, or chief.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.

parse: Article - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Noun - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: The eye; fig: the mind's eye. From optanomai; the eye; by implication, vision; figuratively, envy.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 1st Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to look closely at, i.e. perceive; by extension to visit.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From the base of psallo; to manipulate, i.e. Verify by contact; figuratively, to search for.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Article - Nominative Feminine Plural
str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Noun - Nominative Feminine Plural
str2: A hand.

parse: Preposition
str2: From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.

parse: Article - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Noun - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.

parse: Noun - Genitive Feminine Singular
str2: Life, both of physical (present) and of spiritual (particularly future) existence. From zao; life.
